body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.10 is now available.

What's new in this release:
New version of the Gecko engine based on Firefox 14.
Support for OpenGL in the DIB engine using libOSMesa.
Off-screen rendering is now the default in Direct3D.
Some more WMI infrastructure.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
